ComicInfo.Title: Pickin' Up the Pieces; Waiting For Dr. Blake
ComicInfo.Summary:
Pickin' Up the Pieces: Odin is gone and Asgard mourns. Hela arrives for Odin's soul and Thor drives her off. Back on Earth, the Asgardians, unaware of their ruler's fate, are left to wait since the Rainbow Bridge is shattered. Thor, in grief, wanders the wilderness of Asgard to collect himself.
Waiting For Dr. Blake: Fandral ends the legacy of Don Blake.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:39:11. [Issue ID 39918]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Frigga (guest),Warriors Three [Hogun,Frost Giants (villains),Beta Ray Bill (guest),Hela (villain),Balder (guest),Volstagg] (guests),Fandral,Thor (feature),Loki (villain),Lorelei (villain),Sif (guest),Karnilla (guest),Heimdall (guest),Asgard Kids [Gunnhild] (guest),Colonel Sauleda (guest),Titanium Man (cameo)
